objects.name: CMGT_GRP_SERVICE_ACCOUNTS
objects.description: Points to the service account group

objects.name: CMGT_TXT_CASE_SUB_FOLDERS
objects.description: Returns the list of sub-folders for a case. 1 - PRIVATE, 2 - PUBLIC.

objects.name: CMGT_PLUGIN_ReturnContentRoleMap
objects.description: Runs returncontentrolemap() of Content Tools plugin

objects.name: CMGT_RelatedEntityMap_SetEvents
objects.description: Rule to construct all related entity map events

objects.name: CMGT_RelatedEntityMap_SetMetaData
objects.description: Set meta data fields for CMGT_RelatedEntityMap

objects.name: CMGT_RelatedEntityMap_WriteRecordsProperties
objects.description: Defines what relationships should be stripped before writing and what child FKs should be reattached after writing for: RelatedEntityMap

objects.name: CMGT_SUB_SetCaseFolderSecurity_Logic
objects.description: Does the logic that determines what changes to make to a case's folder structure

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_DisplayUser
objects.description: Returns a display name for a user in the format of "firstName lastName". Null-safe.

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_Distinct
objects.description: Returns the distinct values from a list

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_DistinctRecords
objects.description: Returns distinct records based on certain field(s). For example, passing in fields A and B would return a list of records that have collectively distinct values for A & B. When handling duplicates, the first record in the input list is returned.

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_DropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord
objects.description: The main rule to drop non-writeable relationships from a record before writing in the case the child record is considered changed, which would break the write

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_Filter
objects.description: Filters, rejects, or returns matching indices of a list of records by field-value filter combinations.

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_GetSubFolderByType
objects.description: Returns the sub-folder by its type, based on naming conventions. Searches for any child folder of the parentFolderId that contains the input folderType, and returns the parentFolderId if no child is found.

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank
objects.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_LoadBrandingMap
objects.description: Returns branding map for Case Management

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_MergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable
objects.description: The main rule to merge the ID-output of a write records nodes to the input process variable (including all child FKs). IMPORTANT NOTES in comments in the rule.

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_SetRecordFields
objects.description: Runs a bulk update on a record object, setting new values for its fields

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_TruncateText
objects.description: Truncates given text to a specified number of characters

objects.name: CMGT_formatEventInitiator
objects.description: if the initiator is a service account then save "Automated System" otherwise save the username

objects.name: CMGT_RelatedEntityMap_RecordAction_Manage
objects.description: Form for relating an entity to other entities

objects.name: CMGT_SUB_SetCaseFolderSecurity
objects.description: Sub-process to refresh the folder security of cases anytime any change is made that would impact the security

objects.name: CMGT_CFG_CaseType
objects.description: MODIFIED FOR 2.0 KB AND EML MODULE RELEASE - Case Types

objects.name: CMGT_CFG_RelationshipMapType
objects.description: Relationships types between cases and entities and each other

objects.name: CMGT_Case
objects.description: MODIFIED FOR 2.0 KB , EML MODULE RELEASE , SMART SEARCH - Cases.

objects.name: CMGT_Task
objects.description: MODIFIED FOR 2.0 SMART SEARCH RELEASE - Tasks
